mil.nga.giat.geowave.ingest.local

Interface LocalPluginBase

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LocalFileIngestPlugin<O>, StageToHdfsPlugin<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLocalIngestWithMapper, AbstractStageFileToHdfs, GeoLifeIngestPlugin, GeoToolsRasterDataStoreIngestPlugin, GeoToolsVectorDataStoreIngestPlugin, GpxIngestPlugin, TdriveIngestPlugin

    public interface LocalPluginBase
    This is a base interface for any plugin that reads files from a local file system. The plugin gets an init call at the start of ingestion with the base directory, and can filter files based on extension or act on a file-by-file basis for anything more complex.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String[] getFileExtensionFilters()
      Gets a list of file extensions that this plugin supports.
      void init(File baseDirectory)
      Initialize the plugin and give it the base directory that is provided by the user.
      boolean supportsFile(File file)
      This method will be called for every file that matches the given extensions.

    • Method Detail

      • getFileExtensionFilters

        String[] getFileExtensionFilters()
        Gets a list of file extensions that this plugin supports. If not provided, this plugin will accept all file extensions.
        Returns:
        The array of file extensions supported ('.' is unnecessary)

      • init

        void init(File baseDirectory)
        Initialize the plugin and give it the base directory that is provided by the user.
        Parameters:
        baseDirectory - The base directory provided as a command-line argument (if the argument is a file, the base directory given will be its parent directory).

      • supportsFile

        boolean supportsFile(File file)
        This method will be called for every file that matches the given extensions. It is an opportunity for the plugin to perform arbitrarily complex acceptance filtering on a per file basis, but it is important to understand performance implications if the acceptance test is too intensive and the directory of files to recurse is large.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to determine if this plugin supports for ingestion
        Returns:
        Whether the file is supported or not
